import React, { Component } from "react"; class Game extends Component { state = { score: 0, topScore: 0, imageArray: ["aang.jpg", "appa.jpg", "azula.jpg", "boomy.jpg", "fire-lord.jpg", "iroh.jpg", "jeong-jeong.jpg", "katara.jpg", "momo.jpg", "roku.jpg", "sokka-master.jpg", "sokka.jpg", "sukki.jpg", "tai-lee.jpg", "toph.jpg", "zuko.jpg"] }; shuffleImgs() { for(var i=0; i

Clicky Game

Click an image to begin

Score: {this.state.score} | Top Score: {this.state.topScore}

Clicky Game

Click on an image to earn points, but don't click on any more than once!

); } } export default Game;
